sn45.28:1.2: “Mendicants, I will teach you noble right immersion with its vital conditions and its prerequisites.
sn45.28:1.4: And what is noble right immersion with its vital conditions and its prerequisites?
sn45.28:1.5: There are right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, and right mindfulness.
sn45.28:1.6: Unification of mind with these seven factors as prerequisites is called noble right immersion ‘with its vital conditions’ and ‘with its prerequisites’.”
